law.catch_line: Finance and Administration Cabinet to furnish income estimates.
law.text: On or before June 1 of each year, the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall furnish to the Department of Highways estimates of income for the ensuing fiscal year. Upon the request of the Department of Highways the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall, from time to time, furnish revised estimates of income.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356t-17-2.
